name: VoicePad(Dictation)
0:
”Alexa, open Voice Pad”
”Alexa ask Voice Pad to Record”
”Email”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice pad
des:
Voice Pad dictation let's you record your thoughts when you are out and about (if you use the Amazon phone app featuring Alexa), driving your car (if you have Alexa in your car), washing the dishes, or wherever you use your Alexa device. You can then tell Alexa to email your notes to your registered email address.

How to use:
record - Start recording whatever you say until you say "stop" or another command
stop - Stops recording
email - Send all your recorded notes to your email address. Notes are recorded over multiple sessions, so you can take notes all day and send one email at the end of the day if you wish. When you send an email, it clears all of your current notes.
read - Read back all your current notes. Note: This might not work if you have too much stored.
delete - Delete all your current notes so you have a blank slate to start with.


Shortcuts:
Alexa, ask Voice Pad to record: Starts Voice Pad in record mode right away.
